entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is described as a wizard with a long silver beard, full-length wizard's robes, and a pointe d hat. He is imagined to be on a beach somewhere, rubbing suntan lotion onto his long crooked nose.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig is described as Harry's owl that has never failed to deliver a letter to anyone, even without an address.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the one who is trying to imagine where Dumbledore went during the summer holidays and is writing a letter to him.

relationships.description: Hedwig would be able to find Dumbledore wherever he was.
Harry Potter is writing a letter to Professor Dumbledore.
